Vanishing 5 [i](This enters with five time counters on it. At your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only during your main phase.
When this artifact is sacrificed, add three mana of any one color. Until end of turn, you don’t lose this mana as step and phases end.
